504  {
505  if ( tinyShaders::isInitialized )
506  {
507  std::vector< shader_t* > shaders;
508  shaders.push_back( GetShaderByName( vertexShaderName ) );
509  shaders.push_back( GetShaderByName( fragmentShaderName ) );

GLchar* tinyShaders::FileToBuffer ( const GLchar *  path) const
inlineprivate
826  {
827  FILE* file = fopen( path, "rt" );
828 
829  if ( file == nullptr )
830  {
831  TinyShaders_PrintErrorMessage( TINYSHADERS_ERROR_INVALID_FILE_PATH, path );
832  //printf( "Error: cannot open file %s for reading \n", Path );
833  return nullptr;
834  }
835 
836  //get total byte in given file
837  fseek( file, 0, SEEK_END );
838  GLuint FileLength = ftell( file );
839  fseek( file, 0, SEEK_SET );
840 
841  //allocate a file buffer and read the contents of the file
842  GLchar* buffer = new GLchar[FileLength + 1];
843  memset( buffer, 0, FileLength + 1 );
844  fread( buffer, sizeof( GLchar ), FileLength, file );
845 
846  fclose( file );
847  return buffer;
848  }

static shader_t* tinyShaders::GetShaderByName ( const GLchar *  shaderName)
inlinestatic
239  {
240  if ( tinyShaders::isInitialized )
241  {
242  if ( shaderName != nullptr )
243  {
244  for ( GLuint iterator = 0; iterator < GetInstance()->shaders.size(); iterator++ )
245  {
246  if ( !strcmp( GetInstance()->shaders[iterator]->name, shaderName ) )
247  {
248  return GetInstance()->shaders[iterator];
249  }
250  }
251  TinyShaders_PrintErrorMessage( TINYSHADERS_ERROR_SHADER_NOT_FOUND );
252  return nullptr;
253  }
254  TinyShaders_PrintErrorMessage( TINYSHADERS_ERROR_INVALID_SHADER_NAME );
255  return nullptr;
256  }
257  TinyShaders_PrintErrorMessage( TINYSHADERS_ERROR_NOT_INITIALIZED );
258  return nullptr;
259  }

static void tinyShaders::LoadShader ( const GLchar *  name,

)
inlinestatic
283  {
284  if ( tinyShaders::isInitialized )
285  {
286  if ( name != nullptr )
287  {
288  if ( shaderType <= 5 )
289  {
290  shader_t* newShader = new shader_t( name, shaderType, shaderFile );

569  {
570  if( tinyShaders::isInitialized )
571  {
572  if( buffer != nullptr )
573  {
574  if( name != nullptr )
575  {
576  if( !ShaderExists( name ) )
577  {

static void tinyShaders::LoadShaderProgramsFromConfigFile ( const GLchar *  configFile)
inlinestatic
303  {
304  if ( GetInstance()->isInitialized )
305  {
306  FILE* pConfigFile = fopen( configFile, "r" );
307  GLuint numInputs = 0;
308  GLuint numOutputs = 0;
309  GLuint numPrograms = 0;
310  GLuint numShaders = 0;
311  GLuint iterator = 0;
312 
313  std::vector< const GLchar* > inputs, outputs, paths, names;
314  std::vector< shader_t* > shaders;
315  if ( pConfigFile )
316  {
317  //get the total number of shader programs
318  fscanf( pConfigFile, "%i\n", &numPrograms );
319 
320  for ( GLuint programIter = 0;
321  programIter <numPrograms;
322  programIter++, paths.clear(), inputs.clear(), outputs.clear(), names.clear(), shaders.clear() )
323  {
324  //get the name of the shader program
325  GLchar* programName = new GLchar[255];
326  fscanf( pConfigFile, "%s\n", programName );
327  printf( "%s\n", programName );
328 
329  //this is an anti-trolling measure. If a shader with the same name already exists the don't bother making a new one.
330  if ( !GetInstance()->ShaderProgramExists( programName ) )
331  {
332  //get the number of shader inputs
333  fscanf( pConfigFile, "%i\n", &numInputs );
334 
335  //get all inputs
336  for ( iterator = 0; iterator <numInputs; iterator++ )
337  {
338  GLchar* input = new GLchar[255];
339  fscanf( pConfigFile, "%s\n", input );
340  inputs.push_back( input );
341  }
342 
343  //get the number of shader outputs
344  fscanf( pConfigFile, "%i\n", &numOutputs );
345 
346  //get all outputs
347  for ( iterator = 0; iterator <numOutputs; iterator++ )
348  {
349  GLchar* output = new GLchar[255];
350  fscanf( pConfigFile, "%s\n", output );
351  outputs.push_back( output );
352  }
353 
354  //get number of shaders
355  fscanf( pConfigFile, "%i\n", &numShaders );
356  printf( "%i\n", numShaders );
357 
358  for( GLuint iterator = 0; iterator <numShaders; iterator++ )
359  {
360  GLchar* shaderName = new GLchar[255];
361  GLchar* shaderPath = new GLchar[255];
362  GLchar* shaderType = new GLchar[255];
363 
364  //get shader name
365  fscanf( pConfigFile, "%s\n", shaderName );
366  printf( "%s\n", shaderName );
367 
368  //if the shader hasn't been loaded already then make a new one
369  if( !ShaderExists( shaderName ) )
370  {
371  //get type
372  fscanf( pConfigFile, "%s\n", shaderType );
373  printf( "%s\n", shaderType );
374  //get file path
375  fscanf( pConfigFile, "%s\n", shaderPath );
376  printf( "%s\n", shaderPath );
377 
378  shaders.push_back( new shader_t( shaderName, GetInstance()->StringToShaderType( ( const char* )shaderType ), shaderPath ) );
379  }
380 
381  else
382  {
383  //tell scanf to skip a couple lines
384  fscanf( pConfigFile, "%*[^\n]\n %*[^\n]\n", NULL );
385  //if shader already exists then add an existing one from storage, it should already be compiled
386  shaders.push_back( GetShaderByName( shaderName ) );
387  }
388  }
389 
390  shaderProgram_t* newShaderProgram = new shaderProgram_t( programName, inputs, outputs, shaders );
391  //get shader block names
392  }
393  }
394  fclose( pConfigFile );
395  }
396  else
397  {
398  TinyShaders_PrintErrorMessage( TINYSHADERS_ERROR_INVALID_FILE_PATH );
399  }
400  }
401  else
402  {
403  TinyShaders_PrintErrorMessage( TINYSHADERS_ERROR_NOT_INITIALIZED );
404  }
405  }

static void tinyShaders::LoadShadersFromConfigFile ( const GLchar *  configFile)
inlinestatic
408  {
409  if( tinyShaders::isInitialized )
410  {
411  FILE* pConfigFile = fopen( configFile, "r+" );
412  GLuint numShaders = 0;
413 
414  if( pConfigFile )
415  {
416  //get the number of shaders to load
417  fscanf( pConfigFile, "%i\n", &numShaders );
418  GLchar* shaderName;
419  GLchar* shaderType;
420  GLchar* shaderPath;
421 
422  GLchar empty[255];
423 
424  for( GLuint iterator = 0; iterator <numShaders;
425  iterator++, fscanf( pConfigFile, "\n\n" ) )
426  {
427  shaderName = empty;
428  fscanf( pConfigFile, "%s\n", shaderName );
429 
430  if( !GetInstance()->ShaderExists( shaderName ) )
431  {
432  shaderType = empty;
433  fscanf( pConfigFile, "%s\n", shaderType );
434 
435  shaderPath = empty;
436  fscanf( pConfigFile, "%s\n", shaderPath );
437 
438  shader_t* newShader = new shader_t( shaderName, GetInstance()->StringToShaderType( shaderType ), shaderPath );
439  delete newShader;
440  }
441  }
442  }
443  }
444  }

static void tinyShaders::SaveShaderProgramsToConfigFile ( const GLchar *  fileName)
inlinestatic
447  {
448  //write total amount of shaders
449  FILE* pConfigFile = fopen( fileName, "w+" );
450 
451  fprintf( pConfigFile, "%i\n\n", ( GLint )GetInstance()->shaderPrograms.size() );
452 
453  for( GLuint programIter = 0; programIter < GetInstance()->shaderPrograms.size(); programIter++ )
454  {
455  //write program name
456  fprintf( pConfigFile, "%s\n", GetInstance()->shaderPrograms[programIter]->name );
457 
458  //write number of inputs
459  fprintf( pConfigFile, "%i\n", ( GLint )GetInstance()->shaderPrograms[programIter]->inputs.size() );
460 
461  //write inputs
462  for( GLuint inputIter = 0; inputIter < GetInstance()->shaderPrograms[programIter]->inputs.size(); inputIter++ )
463  {
464  fprintf( pConfigFile, "%s\n", GetInstance()->shaderPrograms[programIter]->inputs[inputIter] );
465  }
466 
467  fprintf( pConfigFile, "%i\n", ( GLint )GetInstance()->shaderPrograms[programIter]->outputs.size() );
468 
469  //write outputs
470  for( GLuint outputIter = 0; outputIter < GetInstance()->shaderPrograms[programIter]->outputs.size(); outputIter++ )
471  {
472  fprintf( pConfigFile, "%s\n", GetInstance()->shaderPrograms[programIter]->outputs[outputIter] );
473  }
474 
475  //write number of shaders
476  fprintf( pConfigFile, "%i\n", ( GLint )GetInstance()->shaderPrograms[programIter]->shaders.size() );
477 
478  for( GLuint shaderIter = 0; shaderIter < GetInstance()->shaderPrograms[programIter]->shaders.size(); shaderIter++ )
479  {
480  //write shader name
481  fprintf( pConfigFile, "%s\n", GetInstance()->shaderPrograms[programIter]->shaders[shaderIter]->name );
482 
483  //write shader type
484  fprintf( pConfigFile, "%s\n", GetInstance()->ShaderTypeToString( GetInstance()->shaderPrograms[programIter]->shaders[shaderIter]->type ) );
485 
486  //write shader file path
487  fprintf( pConfigFile, "%s\n", GetInstance()->shaderPrograms[programIter]->shaders[shaderIter]->filePath );
488  }
489  }
490  fclose( pConfigFile );
491  }

static GLboolean tinyShaders::ShaderExists ( const GLchar *  shaderName)
inlinestatic
548  {
549  if ( shaderName != nullptr )
550  {
551  if ( !GetInstance()->shaders.empty() )
552  {
553  for ( GLuint iterator = 0; iterator < GetInstance()->shaders.size(); iterator++ )
554  {
555  if ( GetInstance()->shaders[iterator] != nullptr &&
556  !strcmp( shaderName, GetInstance()->shaders[iterator]->name ) )
557  {
558  return GL_TRUE;
559  }
560  }
561  return GL_FALSE;
562  }
563  return GL_FALSE;
564  }
565  return GL_FALSE;
566  }

static void tinyShaders::Shutdown ( void  )
inlinestatic
170  {
171  if ( tinyShaders::isInitialized )
172  {
173  for ( GLuint iterator = 0; iterator < GetInstance()->shaders.size(); iterator++ )
174  {
175  GetInstance()->shaders[iterator]->Shutdown();
176  delete GetInstance()->shaders[iterator];
177  }
178 
179  for ( GLuint iterator = 0; iterator < GetInstance()->shaderPrograms.size(); iterator++ )
180  {
181  GetInstance()->shaderPrograms[iterator]->Shutdown();
182  delete GetInstance()->shaderPrograms[iterator];
183  }
184 
185  GetInstance()->shaderPrograms.clear();
186  GetInstance()->shaders.clear();
187 
188  delete instance;
189  }
190  }

GLuint tinyShaders::StringToShaderType ( const GLchar *  typeString) const
inlineprivate
854  {
855  if( typeString != nullptr )
856  {
857  if ( !strcmp( typeString, "Vertex" ) )
858  {
859  return GL_VERTEX_SHADER;
860  }
861 
862  if ( !strcmp( typeString, "Fragment" ) )
863  {
864  return GL_FRAGMENT_SHADER;
865  }
866 
867  if ( !strcmp( typeString, "Geometry" ) )
868  {
869  return GL_GEOMETRY_SHADER;
870  }
871 
872  if ( !strcmp( typeString, "Tessellation Control" ) )
873  {
874  return GL_TESS_CONTROL_SHADER;
875  }
876 
877  if ( !strcmp( typeString, "Tessellation Evaluation" ) )
878  {
879  return GL_TESS_EVALUATION_SHADER;
880  }
881 
882  return GL_FALSE;
883  }
884  TinyShaders_PrintErrorMessage( TINYSHADERS_ERROR_INVALID_STRING );
885  return GL_FALSE;
886  }
